synopsis.text:
Liuqi Wu, along with his companions Dabao and Xiaofei, embarks on a daring journey to the Xuanwu Kingdom in an effort to uncover the truth about his mysterious identity and secure the tranquil existence of Xiaoji Island's inhabitants. As they delve deeper into this quest, they encounter a myriad of enigmatic challenges and thrilling escapades.

Meanwhile, in the aftermath of relentlessly fending off assassination attempts on Chicken Island, Seven finds himself in a formidable duel against the notorious assassin Redtooth. Just as defeat seems imminent, Thirteen's master intervenes, turning the tide in Seven's favor. However, this victory triggers an influx of assassins to the island, all eager to challenge Redtooth's conqueror.

With a burgeoning bounty on his head, Seven resolves to depart from the island and confront the Shadow Killers' leader. Yet, his journey to Xuanwu is fraught with unforeseen detours, leading him to eerie islands and peculiar lands teeming with danger. Aiding him in his mission are Dai Bo and Xiao Fei, who decide to trail Seven. However, their assistance doesn't always prove to be advantageous, adding an unexpected twist to Seven's adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
